description: Logan Thomas just turned 20 and now he is with our casting agent to find out if he has what it takes to be in the adult industry. Our agent interviews him for a bit until he leaves the room and lets Logan get comfortable. Some times straight young dudes need some time alone to get it going but by the time our casting agent came back in Logan had a mean Boner and it stayed rock hard till the end. Logan is young nice and looking to break into the industry but it's up to you our members. Let us know what you think 'cause as of right now he PASSED.
title: Casting Audition: Logan Thomas
